home.heroSubtitle: TableTalk is the global community for those who love sharing stories and flavors. Organize a virtual TableTalk® on your favorite topics or join a conversation already scheduled.

step1.title: 1. Discover
step1.description: Find the perfect virtual table for you. Filter by language, time or topic and choose the conversation you want to join.

step2.title: 2. Participate
step2.description: Choose, click, participate. It's that simple to enter a conversation. You just need curiosity (and a little hunger!).

step3.title: 3. Meet
step3.description: Access the video call and meet your dining companions. It's time to share, learn and enjoy a TableTalk® in great company.

feature1.title: An antidote to loneliness
feature1.description: Whether it's a quick coffee or an elaborate dinner, there's always someone to share it with. Loneliness is not on our menu.

feature2.title: Expand your horizons
feature2.description: Travel from your dining table. Meet people and cultures from around the world and broaden your horizons with every bite.

feature3.title: Authentic and secure connections
feature3.description: A moderated and respectful environment where you can be yourself. Every profile is a world to discover, in total safety.

privacy.title: TableTalk Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Welcome to TableTalk, an application by TableTalk App ("we", "us", "our"). Your privacy is our priority. This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use and protect it, and the rights you have regarding your data when using our application ("Service").

legalBasis.title: 1. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: We process your personal data in compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable privacy laws. The legal basis for our processing includes:
legalBasis.contractualDesc: To provide TableTalk's core features, as specified in our Terms of Service.
legalBasis.consentDesc: For optional features, such as access to your location or push notifications. You can withdraw your consent at any time.
legalBasis.legitimateDesc: To improve our Service, ensure platform security, and prevent fraud.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect the following categories of data:

provided.title: Data You Provide Directly:
provided.registrationDesc: Name, surname, email address, and password (encrypted).
provided.profileDesc: Nickname, profile photo, biography, and other information you choose to share.
provided.communicationsDesc: Information you provide when contacting our customer support.

usage.title: Data Collected During Service Use:
usage.interactionDesc: Information about virtual TableTalk® you create, participate in, users you block or report.
usage.technicalDesc: IP address, device type, operating system, unique device identifiers, and crash data.

location.title: Location Data (with your consent):
location.description: If you provide consent, we may use your location at the city level to suggest nearby TableTalk®. You can disable this feature at any time from your device settings.

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.description: We use your data for the following purposes:
dataUsage.provide: To provide, maintain, and improve the Service.
dataUsage.personalize: To personalize your experience, such as suggesting connections.
dataUsage.manage: To manage your account and send you administrative or support communications.
dataUsage.security: To ensure the security of our platform, monitoring suspicious activities and enforcing our Terms of Service.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell or rent your personal data. We may share your information only with the following categories of third parties:
dataSharing.serviceProvidersDesc: Companies that provide services on our behalf, such as backend hosting (e.g., Render, AWS), communication services for video calls, and analytics. These providers have access to your data only to perform such tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for other purposes.
dataSharing.legalObligationsDesc: If required by law or in response to valid requests from public authorities.

internationalTransfers.title: 5. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Being a global service, your data may be transferred and processed in countries different from where you reside. We ensure that such transfers occur in compliance with applicable privacy laws, using safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal data only for the time strictly necessary to provide you with the Service and to fulfill the purposes described in this policy. In case of account deletion, your personal data will be securely and permanently deleted within 30 days, except for data we are required to retain for legal obligations (e.g., billing data or for fraud prevention).

yourRights.title: 7. Your Privacy Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have several rights regarding your personal data:
yourRights.accessDesc: You can request a copy of the personal data we have about you.
yourRights.rectificationDesc: You can correct inaccurate or incomplete data from your profile or by contacting us.
yourRights.deletion: Right to Deletion ("Right to be Forgotten"):
yourRights.deletionDesc: You can request the deletion of your personal data.
yourRights.limitationDesc: You can request to limit how we process your data.
yourRights.portabilityDesc: You can request to receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
yourRights.oppositionDesc: You can object to the processing of your data for marketing purposes or based on our legitimate interests.
yourRights.exercise: You can exercise most of these rights through your account settings.

accountDeletion.title: 8. Account Deletion
accountDeletion.description: You can delete your account at any time directly from the "Settings" section of our app. Account deletion is an irreversible action and will result in the permanent deletion of all data associated with your profile, as described in our retention policies.

minors.title: 9. Minors' Privacy
minors.description: Our Service is not intended for persons under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If you become aware that a minor has provided us with personal data without parental consent, please contact us.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or the processing of your data, please contact us at the following dedicated email address: infotabletalk.app@gmail.com

terms.title: TableTalk Terms and Conditions
terms.welcome: Welcome to TableTalk. Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using our service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using the TableTalk platform (the "Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.description: TableTalk is a platform that facilitates virtual meetings between people to share TableTalk® and conversations via video call. Users can create events ("TableTalk®") or participate in those created by others.

conduct.title: 3. User Conduct
conduct.description: The user commits to maintaining respectful, inclusive, and non-offensive behavior. Any harassing, discriminatory, or illegal behavior is strictly prohibited. Recording video calls without the explicit consent of all participants is forbidden.

liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: TableTalk provides only the technological platform to connect users and is not responsible for user conduct or conversation content during TableTalk®. Use of the Service is at your own risk.

modifications.title: 5. Service and Terms Modifications
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the Service at any time. We may also revise these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the Service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
